did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Cornell University College of Engineering photographs, 1870-1965.
did.physdesc: Photographs, Maps, Portraits, Negatives, Contact Sheets
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: College of Engineering photographic negatives, ca. 1945-1965, unidentified; seven lantern slides of field trips, 1870-1900, identified; photographs of Physics Dept. apparatus, 1870s-1880s, identified; five glass negatives and photographs of the construction of the Hydraulic Laboratory; glass slides depicting College of Engineering equipment and facilities (1870-1900); and photographs of John McMullen with a McMullen Scholarship brochure.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: College of Engineering photographic negatives, ca. 1945-1965, unidentified; seven lantern slides of field trips, 1870-1900, identified; photographs of Physics Dept. apparatus, 1870s-1880s, identified; five glass negatives and photographs of the construction of the Hydraulic Laboratory; glass slides depicting College of Engineering equipment and facilities (1870-1900); and photographs of John McMullen with a McMullen Scholarship brochure.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University College of Engineering photographs, #16-2-2378. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
